articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Marked
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the 5th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Celebration performances were given at theatres here by national art troupes.
					
					 At a concert given by the National Symphony Orchestra at Moranbong Theatre, artistes represented the profound thanks of the  service personnel and people to respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un who is making a new history of victory of the Songun revolution while fully demonstrating the might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 Performances were also given in Kangwon, South Hamgyong and other provinces.
					
					 On the same day, officials and working people of institutions at various levels in Pyongyang and local areas, industrial establishments and farms enjoyed art performances and had sports games such as basketball, volleyball and table-tennis, revving up the festive atmosphere.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the economic and commercial councilors corps here on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and New Year Juche 106 (2017).
					 Pavel Leshakov, councilor of the Russian embassy who is doyen of the corps, handed them over to an official concerned on Friday.

articles.title: Cambodian, Nigerian Personages Visit DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Cambodian, Nigerian Personages Visit DPRK Embassies
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Cambodian and Nigerian personages visited the DPRK embassies in their countries on Dec. 23 and 24 to mark the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the fifth anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership.
					 They were a delegation of the Cambodian Army Football Association and Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The visitors laid floral baskets and bouquets at the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the picture depicting them.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea received a floral basket from Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander－in－chief of the Armed Forces of Nigeria on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Amos Elisha, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Nigerian Embassy here, handed it to an official concerned Friday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Family
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Family
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Friday received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and New Year Juche 106 (2017).
					 On the same day, he also received a floral basket from Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, on the occasion of the New Year.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the New Year.
					 The floral basket was placed at the statues Friday.

articles.title: Party and State Commendations Go to Participants of 4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA
articles.content:
Party and State Commendations Go to Participants of 4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Party and state commendations were conferred on the participants in the 4th meeting of activists in fisheries under the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Ko Ton Ha, Pak Yong Nam and Choe Wol Gwang received the title of DPRK Labor Hero and Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class.
					
					 Jong Yong Nam, Han Ki Chol, Jang Myong Ho, Rim Won Hak and Kim Kwang Il received the watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The watches bearing the august name of leader Kim Jong Il went to Ri Myong Chol, Ri Ju Bom and Ri Hyon Ok.
					
					 Citations of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, were conferred upon Jin Bong Jun, Yun Yong Il, Kim Pyong Chol, An Yong Son, Ri Kwang Sok, Jong Song Ryong, Ri Ju Hyok, Kang Ki Hwan, Rim Ryong Jin, Kim Thae Son, Ri Kang Chol, Ko Kyong Ryong, Kim Chun Gil and Kim Kyong Sok.
					
					 Citations of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, went to Jang Ki Yong and Choe Chon Mun.
					
					 The title of Merited Fisherman went to three persons, Order of National Flag First Class to 31, Order of Labor to 15, Order of National Flag Second Class to 90 and Order of National Flag Third Class to 83.
					
					 Patriotic trophy "sea of gold" and patriotic diploma "sea of gold" in the name of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK went to the fishing stations that distinguished themselves in the fishing operations this year.
					
					 The awarding ceremony took place Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful at 1st Northeast Asian Taekwon-Do Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful at 1st Northeast Asian Taekwon-Do Championship
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK bagged 19 gold medals at the 1st Northeast Asian Taekwon-Do Championship.
					 The championship took place in China on Dec. 16-18. It brought together more than 100 man and woman players from DPRK, Mongolia, Nepal, Turkmenistan and other countries and regions.
					
					 Kim Kwang Chon of the DPRK won the title in the second-grade men's individual pattern, Choe Hyon Il in the third-grade men's individual pattern, Han Kwang Guk in the fourth-grade men's individual pattern, Kim Il Hwa in the second-grade women's individual pattern, Kim Un Hwa in the third-grade women's individual pattern and Kim Ji Hyang in the fourth-grade women's individual pattern. 
					
					 Ra Kyong Hun, Kim Kwang Chon, Choe Hyon Il and Ri Song Il placed first in men's individual 57kg, 64kg, 85kg and above 85kg sparring matches, while Kim Ji Hyang, Kim Un Hwa and Kim Il Hwa in women's individual 69kg, 75kg and above 75kg sparring matches.
					
					 The DPRK came first in men's and women's self-defense matches.
					
					 Choe Myong Chol took the title in the men's individual demonstration, Kim Un Hwa in the women's individual demonstration, Ri Song Il in the men's individual special technique and Kim Il Hwa in the women's individual special technique.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Il Hwa earned the best prize of individual technique in the championship.
					
					 The DPRK players returned home Friday.

articles.title: Celebration Dancing Parties of Youth and Students in DPRK
articles.content:
Celebration Dancing Parties of Youth and Students in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the DPRK on Friday to celebrate the 5th anniversary of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 With the playing of the song "Our Leader Loved by People", dancing party began in various parts of Pyongyang, including plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 The participants presented dances, extending eternal glory to Kim Jong Un who is steadfastly carrying forward the tradition of the Paektusan army while leaving immortal marks in the history of the Juche-based army building.
					
					 They enthusiastically danced, singing such songs as "Train Bound for the Front" and "Youth and Courage".
					
					 The festive atmosphere revved up when merry songs were played. 
					
					 There took place similar dancing parties in various provincial capitals, cities and county seats.

articles.title: High-efficient Farm Machines Manufactured in DPRK
articles.content:
High-efficient Farm Machines Manufactured in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- A number of high-efficient and modern farm machines were manufactured during the 200-day campaign in the DPRK, challenging big efforts into realizing the comprehensive mechanization of agriculture.
					 The newly-developed farm machines were exhibited at the 43rd National Farm Machine Exhibition and Contrivers' Meeting.
					
					 Prof. and Dr. Pak Man Song of the Farm Machine Institute under the Ministry of Agriculture told KCNA:
					
					 The farm machines displayed in the exhibition are put on a comprehensive and multi-purpose basis, and they are manpower-saving and water-saving ones suited to the topographical conditions and constitutional character of Koreans.
					
					 Among them are manpower-saving threshing machines and water-saving soil-managing machines.
					
					 A comprehensive, mobile maize thresher made by the Farm Machine Station in Unpha County, North Hwanghae Province can raise the threshing capacity five times compared with the existing ones and save 60 percent of manpower and 20 percent of electric power, while doing selection and package.
					
					 A mobile bean, wheat and barley thresher manufactured by the Farm Machine Station in Hoechang County, South Phyongan Province can save 40 percent of electric power.
					
					 Jong Son, department director of the Ministry of Agriculture, said:
					
					 The newly-manufactured farm machines are high-efficient and modern ones.
					
					 10 odd kinds of farm machines have been introduced in co-op farms.
					
					 Those machines are the fruit of the self-development principle of the technicians and agricultural workers.
					
					 When visiting the exhibition of machinery and equipment in May, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un gave an important guideline that the comprehensive mechanization of agriculture should be pushed forward.
					
					 The state is planning to raise the level of mechanization in farm work at 60 or 70 percent by accelerating the comprehensive mechanization of agriculture on the basis of achievements gained in the 200-day campaign.

articles.title: Dwelling House Assigned to Ten Year Old Girl in DPRK
articles.content:
Dwelling House Assigned to Ten Year Old Girl in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- In the DPRK, a dwelling house was assigned to a ten year old girl living in Yonsa County of North Hamgyong Province.
					 Her name is Pak Kyong Hui, a fourth-year pupil studying at a primary class of Ryangsu Senior Middle School in Namjak-ri. She lost her parents by the flood that hit the northern parts of the province some months ago.
					
					 But the state assigned the house equipped with all the household articles to her free of charge.
					
					 Officials of ri and county, teacher and mates frequented her house.
					
					 Some days ago, she had a pleasant time at the Songdowon International Children's Camp. 
					
					 In contrast with this, maltreatment of children, including a case of killing 197 U-12 children, has reached the zenith in south Korea in recent years.

articles.title: Juche-based Literature and Art Promotes Advance of Mallima Era
articles.content:
Juche-based Literature and Art Promotes Advance of Mallima Era
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- A large number of masterpieces have been created in the field of literature and art in the DPRK this year, positively encouraging the service personnel and people out in the struggle for building a socialist power.
					 Two full-length novels of the serial "Immortal Guidance" showing undying feats and greatness of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, a collection of short stories, a cycle of revolutionary legends and other literary works instill into the Korean people the national pride of holding great leaders in high esteem.
					
					 The creators and artistes in the stage art field produced revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight", drama "Blood Vessel", music and dance story "Life Story of Youth" and other music and dance poem and dance suit.
					
					 Songs "Glory to General Kim Jong Un", "Glory to the Workers' Party of Korea", "Our Faith", "We Are Mallima Riders " and "Song of Youth", long epic "Sky of Sun", full-length novel "Fantasia of Sea" and medium-length story "Beautiful Life" were also produced as masterpieces of the era.
					
					 The sixth national pencil drawing festival, the state industrial art exhibition for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the national art exhibition for celebrating the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea were held in the art field.
					
					 Meanwhile, Korean acrobats received top prizes at the 24th Massy International Circus Festival and the World Circus Festival "Idol-2016", displaying the developing feature of the Juche-oriented acrobatics.
					
					 Feature films "Story about My House", "Trace of Military Service", "Graduation Diploma" and other films were produced in the cinematic art sector.

articles.title: Guided by Kim Jong Un, DPRK Emerged Victorious Again: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Guided by Kim Jong Un, DPRK Emerged Victorious Again: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) --  The DPRK glorified this year with victory as respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un stands at the helm of the Korean revolution, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Friday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The whole world was thrilled by the news that Kim Jong Un issued an order to conduct the first H-bomb test of Juche Korea on behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea and then signed the final written order.
					
					 The DPRK emerged a full-fledged nuclear power possessed of even H-bomb, thus depriving the U.S. of its unchallenged right to make a preemptive nuclear attack. 
					
					 He made sure that epoch-making actions were taken one after another in order to consolidate the DPRK's strategic position in the wake of H-bomb test.
					
					 Then, followed such events as the test-fire of ground to ground medium-and-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10 in June, the test-fire of submarine-launched ballistic missile in August and the successful nuclear warhead explosion test in September.
					
					 The U.S. made desperate efforts. It staged joint military drills for aggression while grumbling about "threat" to peace and "provocation" whenever the DPRK took steps for self-defence. 
					
					 The latest weapons newly developed under the guidance of Kim Jong Un demonstrated their might one after another. And the military drills and shelling contests staged by all services and arms of the Korean People's Army dealt telling blows at the enemies.
					
					 Hurrah for the Workers' Party of Korea resounded in the flood-hit northern part of the country went to prove that the DPRK won a shining victory in the campaign to recover from the severe natural disaster and the struggle to foil the escalating sanctions and pressure of the enemies.
					
					 The hostile forces further tightened sanctions against the DPRK but the spirit of the Paektusan heroic youth was fully displayed and an unusually bumper harvest of fruits was reaped at the foot of Chol Pass and a new history of big fish hauls was unfolded in the sea.
					
					 When looking back on the year crowded with such events, the Korean people feel increasingly confident of the justness of their cause and its victory. Their pluck is growing strong as they are led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Group of S. Korea for Driving Inter-Korean Ties into Rock Bottom
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Group of S. Korea for Driving Inter-Korean Ties into Rock Bottom
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article denounces the south Korean puppet authorities for going reckless in the campaign to stifle the DPRK in pursuance of their confrontation policy throughout the year, utterly indifferent to the improvement of the north-south relations and detente and the national reunification.
					 The article says:
					
					 The worst crimes perpetrated by traitor Park Geun Hye were that she blocked all ways of dialogue and negotiations, scuppering all the opportunities for mending the inter-Korean ties. 
					
					 This year the DPRK put forward realistic proposals and spared no efforts to realize them, prompted by the noble will to weather the serious crisis facing the destiny of the nation and lying in the way of national reunification.
					
					 However, the Park group described the fair proposals of the DPRK for improving the ties as "camouflaged peace offensive" and "dialogue without sincerity", turning down its offers. They went the lengths of rejecting the DPRK-proposed talks between military authorities of the north and the south for averting the military conflict and easing the tension on the Korean peninsula, as one aimed at "creating discord in the south" and "making a crack in the international sanctions on the north".
					
					 Encouraged by the positive measures of the DPRK, NGO personages of south Korea contacted with representatives of the DPRK overseas to significantly mark the 16th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 71st anniversary of the liberation of the country and discussed events common to the nation. But the puppet regime incriminated those actions and brutally suppressed them.
					
					 The reckless anti-DPRK provocations of the confrontation maniacs pushed the inter-Korean ties to the lowest ebb in history.
					
					 Their confrontation policy has gone totally bust and the Park group is fated to meet a miserable doom.
					
					 The group of traitors will have to pay dearly for all thrice-cursed crimes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams War Drum Beats of U.S. and S. Korean Forces against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams War Drum Beats of U.S. and S. Korean Forces against DPRK
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. held a high-level meeting of "consultative group for extended deterrence strategy" with the south Korean puppet forces.
					 This was the first meeting of the group held under an agreement reached at a meeting of diplomatic and defense chiefs which took place in Washington in October on creating the above-said group for the purpose of improving the performance of "extended deterrence." It reportedly discussed proposals for military deterrence, diplomatic pressure and escalation of sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun observes that the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' decision to create such group is not for "putting" south Korea under "nuclear umbrella" but for making a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK.
					
					 The confab held by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers on an adventurous military "strategy" goes to prove once again that they are making desperate efforts to invade the DPRK any time, it says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. escalating nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK and war drum beats can never be tolerated as they are a grave encroachment upon the latter's sovereignty.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will bolster up the nuclear deterrence in every way to cope with the hostile forces' moves for a preemptive nuclear strike as it had already declared.
					
					 It is entirely just for the DPRK to bolster up its war deterrence under the present tense situation where a war may break out on the Korean Peninsula any time due to the above-said war moves of the U.S.
					
					 Now that the U.S. scenario for making a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK's nuclear weapons and missiles has entered the phase of practical implementation, the latter will increase in every way its efforts to disable the former's striking means.

articles.title: Authorities' Pro-Japanese Act Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Pro-Japanese Act Denounced in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Protests against the puppet authorities' pro-Japanese deed were reportedly staged in Seoul and other parts of south Korea on Wednesday as regards the lapse of one year after the conclusion of a disgraceful "agreement" on sexual slavery between Japan and south Korea.
					More than 2,000 people, including victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and politicians, held a Wednesday meeting outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul.
					
					 The participants deplored the conclusion of the agreement on Dec. 28 of last year that made the people spend one year in pain and sorrow. They said it is an example of Park Geun Hye-style abuse of politics.
					
					 At the end of the meeting they marched to the puppet ministry of Foreign Affairs.
					
					 Civic and social organizations in North Jolla Province held a press conference in Jonju in demand of the nullification of the "agreement" on sexual slavery and repeal of an agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan.
					
					 Similar actions were conducted in various areas of south Korea.
					
					 On the same day the opposition camp grew vocal censuring the conclusion of the "agreement" on sexual slavery.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Copter Firing Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Copter Firing Drill
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The puppet army of south Korea staged a firing drill of the newly-purchased copters in Yangphyong, Kyonggi Province on Dec. 29, according to Yonhap news of south Korea.
					 Six Apache helicopters fired machine-guns and rockets, etc. from the air, kicking up war hysteria.
					
					 After equipping the army with those copters in May last, the warmongers decided to purchase 36 copters in all till the outset of the next year.
					
					 They were reported to have organized squadrons of those copters in September and December.

articles.title: Chongwadae Slammed for Masterminding Mapping out of Blacklist
articles.content:
Chongwadae Slammed for Masterminding Mapping out of Blacklist
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Ryu Jin Ryong, former minister of Culture, Sports and Tourisms of south Korea, disclosed on Dec. 26 that the Chongwadae spearheaded the mapping out of blacklist in the field of culture which sparked off furor, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 He said that the chief secretary for Education and Culture of Chongwadae handed the blacklist to the ministry at the order of Kim Ki Chun, former presidential chief of staff.
					
					 The blacklist was drawn up by the puppet authorities to crackdown upon persons of culture and arts who are disobedient to the authorities. Put on it are 9 473 persons of culture and arts who called for probing the truth behind the "Sewol" ferry disaster, opposed the puppet group of traitors and supported the progressive forces.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by U.S. Media
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by U.S. Media
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- AP of the United States introduced the reality of the DPRK on Dec. 17.
					 The events that have happened in the DPRK since Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's official appearance in the political arena can be analyzed in various aspects, the press said, adding:
					
					 First, the political foundation of Kim Jong Un has been strengthened.
					
					 He has peculiar charisma attracting people. He made public speeches on major occasions.
					
					 Second, the nuclear and rocket technology has made progress.
					
					 North Korea's nuclear capability has grown stronger thanks to him.
					
					 The three most powerful of the nuclear tests made so far were conducted in the recent couple of years.
					
					 North Korea has means capable of striking even the U.S. mainland and it is dashing ahead to conquer the space.
					
					 Third, this is the result of its implementation of the new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 North Korea is attaching importance to the development of science and technology in economic construction, in particular.
					
					 It is true that this country is subject to international "sanctions," but it is proved in reality that the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts is effective.
					
					 As a matter of fact, north Korea emerged a nuclear weapons state and its economy is making steady development. 
					
					 Fourth, north Korea is enforcing the system calling for managing socialist enterprises in a responsible manner.
					
					 Fifth, the people enjoy better culture and leisure.
					
					 The north Korean leader reiterated his will to build the country into a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 Centers for culture and leisure have sprung up in various places as planned by him.
					
					 North Korea is paying great attention to the development of sports with a great ambition to emerge a world sports power.
					
					 The U.S. Fox News, too, conveyed a similar report on the same day.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Lectures and film shows took place in Myanmar, DR Congo, Angola and South Africa between December 12 and 15 in commemoration of the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 "Kimjongilia", "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 Present at the events were personages and popular masses from different walks of life in those countries.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Yangon Regional Executive Committee of Myanmar's National League for Democracy said that Kim Jong Il was the distinguished thinker-theoretician and leader and the benevolent father as he comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea, the Songun idea, turned the DPRK into an invincible power any formidable enemy dare provoke and enjoyed absolute support and trust from the people.
					
					 He is still deeply revered by the Korean people and the world progressives for his great exploits, the vice-chairman added.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for Study of Songun Policy at Bandundu University of DR Congo said in a lecture:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il is the peerlessly great man who bolstered up the military muscle of the DPRK and consolidated the socialist system centered on the popular masses with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 He had made a ceaseless journey of Songun leadership all his life.
					
					 Eye-opening successes in the DPRK would have been unthinkable without his wise leadership.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in DR Congo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by DR Congo News Agency
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by DR Congo News Agency
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- "On Improving the Role of the UAWK in Accomplishing the Juche-Oriented Socialist Cause", a letter sent by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK), was reported by DR Congo news agency on December 17.
					 The work, published on Dec. 6, Juche 105 (2016), clarifies that the UAWK is a mass-based political organization of the Korean socialist agricultural workers, founded and developed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and a reliable transmission belt and peripheral organization of the Party.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways for the union.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de Presidente nigeriano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de Presidente nigeriano
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que con motivo del Ano Nuevo le enviara Muhammadu Buhari, Presidente de la Republica Federal de Nigeria y Comandante en Jefe de las Fuerzas Armadas de Nigeria.
					El encargado de negocios a.i. de Nigeria en Corea, Amos Elisha, lo traslado el dia 30 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto y carta de felicitacion de Cuerpo de Consejeros
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto y carta de felicitacion de Cuerpo de Consejeros
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio el cesto de flores y la carta de felicitacion que le dirigieran el Cuerpo de Consejeros Economicos y Comerciales en Corea con motivo del 5o aniversario del nombramiento del Maximo Dirigente como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ano Nuevo de 106 (2017) de la Era Juche.
					El jefe del cuerpo, Pavel Leshakov, consejero de la embajada rusa en Corea, los traslado el dia 30 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Delegacion de Camboya y personalidad de Nigeria visitan las embajadas coreanas
articles.content:
Delegacion de Camboya y personalidad de Nigeria visitan las embajadas coreanas
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 25o aniversario de nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del 5o aniversario de la ascension del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un al mismo cargo militar, una delegacion de Camboya y una personalidad nigeriana realizaron los dias 23 y 24 las visitas de felicitacion a las embajadas coreanas en los respectivos paises.
					Los miembros de la delegacion de la Asociacion de Futbol Militar del Reino de Camboya y el presidente del Comite Nacional Nigeriano de Estudio de Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar cesto y ramos de flores ante sus retratos con amplia sonrisa y las obras de bellas artes en que los grandes Lideres se encuentran juntos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras agresivas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras agresivas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos sostuvieron la reunion de alto nivel del "grupo consultivo de la estrategia de disuasivo ampliado". 
					El grupo fue fundado segun el acuerdo de la reunion de ministros de Relaciones Exteriores y de Defensa, sesionada en octubre pasado en Washington, con la mision de elevar la capacidad ejecutiva del "disuasivo ampliado". 
					
					En su primera sesion se discutio el proyecto de ampliar el disuasivo militar, la presion diplomatica y la sancion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El periodico Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 30, revela que la instauracion del "grupo" no persigue la meta de defender el Sur de Corea con el "paraguas nuclear", sino para dar el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					El debate de la aventurera "estrategia" militar entre EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea comprueba otra vez que estos belicistas intentan invadir en cualquier momento a la RPDC, senala el comentarista y continua:
					
					No se puede permitir jamas la creciente amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. y sus preparativos de la guerra anti-RPDC que constituyen grave atentado contra la soberania de esta.
					
					Como ya han declarado, el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC consolidaran por todos los medios el disuasivo nuclear frente a las maniobras de ataque nuclear preventivo de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Ya que perdura en la Peninsula Coreana la situacion a punto de estallido de guerra por culpa de los imperialistas norteamericanos, es muy justo que la RPDC incremente el disuasivo de guerra para hacerle frente.
					
					Se multiplicaran los esfuerzos de la RPDC por neutralizar el ataque preventivo nuclear de EE.UU. contra las bases de armas nucleares y misiles de la primera.
